thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: Kim Levy
thread.title_full: Exceptional Villas reviewed by Kim Levy

author: Kim Levy
title: Kim Levy
text:
Emma at Exceptional Villas was extremely helpful in providing information about different properties for us. She keyed in on our needs, stayed within budget and gave us first hand information about all the properties and areas. Her answers were detailed, honest and on point.
She was prompt in her responses and went out of her way to provide us with numerous options that were a fit for our family. I wouldn't hesitate to book with exceptional villas at any time and look forward to working with them in the future. In todays world of online information, it is refreshing to have someone looking out for you when planning a trip.
